titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the Afna Education and Research Fund for the African American Memorial Tomb of the Unknown Slaves and Historical Sculpture Garden.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the Afna Education and Research Fund to design and build the African American Memorial Tomb of the Unknown Slaves and Historical Sculpture Garden in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations.
